AltName.entry: FRIENDS OF CROOKES VALLEY AND WESTON PARK

Desc.entry: Aims to secure a viable future for the parks by working in partnership with the City Council and other organisations that have responsibility for their maintenance, development and enhancement, for the benefit of the community. Provided support for the Heritage Lottery Bid for Weston Park to secure its restoration. Main objectives currently are fundraising for improvements to Crookes Valley Park, especially the lake and its wildlife habitat and other more general projects. Activities include events in the parks, practical work days to improve the parks, social events and public meetings to discuss proposals for the parks.
